thread.section_title: Hotel Edouard 7 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Capital visit
thread.title_full: Capital visit - Review of Hotel Edouard 7, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MrJohn69
title: Capital visit
text:
A well placed Hotel with a conscientious staff who worked hard to ensure everything was done to make our visit enjoyable.One minor complaint was that the seatin in the bedroom was not at all comfortable...odd looking Bouffet style seats. However put this into the context of everything else being absolutely first class.Wonderful breakfast with hot or cold choices or both!
Room Tip: Upgraded to a suite with a balcony and a view of the opera. This was at no extra charge. See more room tips
